string.value: #m261000000#, the town of alchemists, has a dark history that had been hidden away from the public. #m261000000# was built where the Black Magician's Lab was a long time ago, when the Wizard ruled all of Ossyria. The town was initially growing with the experiments conducted by the Black Magician as foundation. If this fact is ever let out to the public, the damage to #m261000000#'s reputation might be irreputable, they say...
#p2111002#, the missing alchemist ... His beginning of the tragedy might have stemmed from the town of #m261000000# in itself. The end of this story is...

What I am about to tell you might sound like an excuse, an excuse from someone who may know everything, but was too afraid to release any of the information... an excuse from a coward like me. Would you still listen to the story?

#m261000000# is a town that was established over a lab of the Black Magician, who brought darkness to the whole continent of Ossyria. I am not saying it's literally built over the lab. I'm saying that all alchemy-related studies in #m261000000# are... based on the studies of the Black Magician.

Of course, that doesn't mean they are working on evil spells like the Black Magician. They were just referencing the Black Magician's work purely from an academic standpoint. Even with that, after a while, almost all remnants of the Black Magician disappeared.

Even with all that, it doesn't change the fact that #m261000000# is based on Black Magician. You may not be aware of it, since it hasn't been too long since you first got to Ossyria, but... Ossyria still has a number of forces that oppose the Black Magician.

Imagine if they find out about the history of #m261000000# and its origin... The reputation of #m261000000#, a respected alchemist town that heavily affects Ossyria as a whole with their contributions, will go down the drain. That's why the presidents of the Societies in #m261000000# have been adamant about keeping all this quiet.

But nowadays, I am not sure if this should be kept secret any longer. Look at #p2111002#, a bright alchemist with a great future. His only sin was dedicating his whole life to the studies and researches... and when he became too close to the truth, he became a martyr instead. The truth must be told... to make sure his name emerges clean and free of rumors and scandals, if nothing else...
Never mind, then. You can't handle the truth!

#p2111000# of Zenumist Society. #p2111001# of Alcadno Society. #p2020005#... #m261000000# and the Black Magician. The missing #p2111002#. The only person that knows everything about these topics, and how they are interrelated is you. I'll let you decide what to do with it, since you're the only person here who is unaffiliated and therefore unbiased.

I'll entrust you to take #b#t4161033##k. Whether you decide to reveal the grim truth behind this saga... or keep it a secret for the sake of peace... I don't care which path you choose. It's your call.
